member.name: IPackageExecutionStateChangeNotification.OnStateChanged
member.summary: Called when package state changes during Windows Store app debugging.
member.param: The new state that the package changed to.
member.returns: Return S_OK when you implement the OnStateChanged method.

member.name: IPackageExecutionStateChangeNotification
member.summary: Enables receiving package state-change notifications during Windows Store app debugging.
